p: A literature search was carried out in the guideline databases, Medline and Embase and in Diabetes Societies websites until May 21st, 2020 for guidelines and recommendations on type 1 diabetes mellitus management during COVID-19 pandemic. The search terms used were: COVID or COVID-19 or coronavirus or SARS-CoV2, and type 1 diabetes mellitus, and children, and adolescents, and recommendations. The searches were limited to papers published in English. A descriptive analysis was performed.
